title: ++ MADType is proud to announce the release of Mercado ++
content:
+++++

Mercado is a new original stencil font family of 3 and includes uppercase, lowercase, and a large international character set.  
This new family and other MADType faces can be viewed and purchased via [http://www.madtype.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329211854/http:/www.madtype.net/) and [http://www.myfonts.com/foundry/madtype/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329211854/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/madtype/)

+++++
author: Miss Tiffany : 26 August, 2005 - 9:10am

comments.content: Nice work as always! It’s pretty temping… I like the increased typographic character of this stencil. Most stencils fonts feel a bit sterile. This one doesn’t.
